comment: I said over a year ago Michelle was going to run in . I got told I was crazy. Now Michelle is rebuking Hillary and Holder. I'll see you next year when Michelle announces.
amr:
# ::snt I said over a year ago Michelle was going to run in . I got told I was crazy. Now Michelle is rebuking Hillary and Holder. I'll see you next year when Michelle announces.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (r / run-02
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Michelle")))
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (n2 / now)
                  :quant (o / over
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year)))))
      :snt2 (t2 / tell-01
            :ARG1 (c / crazy-03
                  :ARG1 ii)
            :ARG2 ii)
      :snt3 (r2 / rebuk-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Michelle"))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p3 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Hillary"))
                  :op2 (p4 / person
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Holder")))
            :time (n6 / now))
      :snt4 (s2 / see-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)
            :time (y3 / year
                  :mod (n7 / next))
            :time (a2 / announce-01
                  :ARG0 p2)))

comment: Racist hate speech containing the "n word" is not permitted here. Please adjust. Thank you.
amr:

            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you))
